snippet.title: JIWA : THE DAMNED SOUL - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Two best friends, both passionate supernatural content creators, explore an abandoned hospital in hopes of creating the ultimate viral video by summoning spirits using a jelangkung ritual. When one friend mysteriously disappears, the player takes on the role of the other, navigating through the decaying hospital in a desperate search. As eerie supernatural events unfold, the player must solve intricate puzzles while evading malevolent ghosts that haunt every corner. As they venture deeper, they uncover the hospital’s dark secrets and the terrifying fate that may await their friend, all while being stalked by a sinister presence. The atmosphere becomes increasingly tense as the player balances solving the mystery with surviving the haunted environment.

Visit our page https://doe-play-interactive.itch.io/jiwa-the-damned-soul

Find us
https://linktr.ee/doeplayinteractive

Music used in video:
Desecrated by Revolt Production Music
